turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi! can you help me order pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! any decisions you've made?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want papa johns.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, the one near your house on Eastman st?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, do they have any specials at the moment?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They're having a buy two medium pizzas for 15 special

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get any toppings that I want on those?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, just one topping on each pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok then Ill take a pepperoni and cheese with that promotion

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you add some wings to the order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind? Plain? Buffalo?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Plain

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Also, what kind of crust would you like on that pizza order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. I'm putting in the order for two mediums, one pepperoni and one cheese, regular crust. Along with a side of wings. That will be 21.46 at the papa johns on eastman st. Can you confirm?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I put in the order, it should arrive in 30-45 mins

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem at all. Enjoy your dinner!

items.name: the one near your house on Eastman st
